Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Revamped by TakeoHonorable --Now has the ability to actually vanquish all things vampire -- + 33% dasmage resistance
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local Effect = Handle:WaitForChild("Effects"):WaitForChild("Flare") Effect.Enabled = true
local Remote = (Tool:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteEvent") or Create("RemoteEvent"){ Name = "Remote", Parent = Tool })
local Animations = {}
local Sounds = { Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash"), Sprint = Handle:WaitForChild("Sprint"), SwordHit = Handle:WaitForChild("SwordHit"), Equip = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip"), CoffinStrike = Handle:WaitForChild("CoffinStrike") }
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
local Special = true
local Events = {}
local Deletables = {}
local lastArmWeldRemovedConnection = nil
local function CreateArmWeld(Shield) --if ArmShieldWeld then return end if Character and (Character:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') or Character:FindFirstChild('LeftUpperArm')) then if lastArmWeldRemovedConnection then lastArmWeldRemovedConnection:Disconnect() lastArmWeldRemovedConnection = nil end
Events[#Events+1] = (Character:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') or Character:FindFirstChild('LeftUpperArm')).ChildRemoved:Connect(function(child) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health ~= 0 and Tool.Parent == Character and child.Name == 'ArmWeld' then CreateArmWeld(Shield) end end)
lastArmWeldRemovedConnection = Events[#Events]
Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Create('Weld'){ Name = "ArmWeld", Part0 = (Character:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') or Character:FindFirstChild('LeftUpperArm')), Part1 = Shield, C0 = CFrame.new() * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90), math.rad(90), 0), C1 = CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, 0, 0.6), Parent = (Character:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') or Character:FindFirstChild('LeftUpperArm')) }
Shield.Parent = Tool else --print('CreateArmWeld: you have no character or no left arm.') end end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local function HasFinisher(Hum) -- Quick check to see if they're not stunned local Children = Services.ServerScriptService:GetChildren() for i=1, #Children do if Children[i]:IsA("Script") and Children[i].Name == "Finisher" and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target") and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target").Value == Hum.Parent then return true end end return false end
function Touched(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if Hum and Hum ~= Humanoid and Hum.Health > 0 and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Player, Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) if (Hum.Health/Hum.MaxHealth)*100 <= 30 then if not HasFinisher(Hum) then --Cue the finisher instead local Finisher = script:WaitForChild("Finisher"):Clone() Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = Hum.Parent, Parent = Finisher } Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Character, Parent = Finisher } Finisher.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService Finisher.Disabled = false end else UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(20)
end end end
function Vanquish() Animations.ExecuteAnim:Play() delay(.5, function() local VanquishScript = script:WaitForChild("Vanquish"):Clone() VanquishScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService
Create("Vector3Value"){ Name = "Position", Value = (Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")).Position, Parent = VanquishScript } Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Player, Parent = VanquishScript }
VanquishScript.Disabled = false Sounds.CoffinStrike:Play() end) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false Sounds.Slash:Play() Animations.SwingAnim:Play(nil,nil,2) wait(.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Character then return end
Animations = Tool:WaitForChild("Animations") Animations = { EquipAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("EquipAnim")), ExecuteAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("ExecuteAnim")), IdleAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("IdleAnim")), SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("SwingAnim")) }
local Shield = Create("Part"){ Size = Vector3.new(2.4, 5.2, 0.8)*(Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")).Size.Z, Massless = true, Locked = true, Parent = Tool } Create('SpecialMesh'){ MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94752182', TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94752144', Scale = Vector3.new(2.3,2.3,2.3), Parent = Shield, } CreateArmWeld(Shield) Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Shield
local IgnoreHealthChange = false local CurrentHealth = Humanoid.Health Events[#Events+1] = Humanoid.Changed:Connect(function(Property) local NewHealth = Humanoid.Health if not IgnoreHealthChange and NewHealth ~= Humanoid.MaxHealth and NewHealth > 0 then if NewHealth < CurrentHealth then local DamageDealt = (CurrentHealth - NewHealth) IgnoreHealthChange = true Humanoid.Health = Humanoid.Health + (DamageDealt * .67) IgnoreHealthChange = false end end CurrentHealth = NewHealth end)
Events[#Events+1] = Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated) Events[#Events+1] = Handle.Touched:Connect(Touched) Sounds.Equip:Play() Animations.EquipAnim:Play() Animations.IdleAnim:Play()
Events[#Events+1] = Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(client,Key) if not Tool.Enabled or client ~= Player or not Key or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Special then return end Tool.Enabled = false Special = false Effect.Enabled = false
delay(2,function() Tool.Enabled = true end)
Vanquish()
delay(30,function() Effect.Enabled = true Special = true end) end) end
function Unequipped()
for _,anim in pairs(Animations) do if anim then anim:Stop() end end Animations = {}
for i=1,#Events do if Events[i] then Events[i]:Disconnect();Events[i] = nil end end Events = {}
for i=1,#Deletables do if Deletables[i] then Deletables[i]:Destroy() end end Deletables = {} end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)

--The wave that made the vampires and bats no more! --Stuns players, but eradicates all things bats and vampires!
local Creator, SpawnPos = script:FindFirstChild("Creator"), script:FindFirstChild("Position")
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not SpawnPos then script:Destroy() end --print("Vanquishing")
SpawnPos = SpawnPos.Value
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local Vector,Cframe,ceil,huge,max,lower,find,Region,unpac,Seed = Vector3,CFrame,math.ceil,math.huge,math.max,string.lower,string.find,Region3,unpack,Random.new() -- pre-declaring these variables should help with latency
local WavePart = Create("Part"){ Name = "Effect", Locked = true, CanCollide = false, Anchored = true, CastShadow = false, CFrame = Cframe.new(SpawnPos), Size = Vector.new(1,1,1), Material = Enum.Material.ForceField, Color = Color3.fromRGB(117,0,0), Parent = workspace } local WaveMesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere, Scale = Vector.new(0,0,0), Parent = WavePart }
local IgnoreList = {} local IgnoreHumanoids = {} local Anims = {}
local TargetNames = {"undying", "vampire", "bat"}
local function VanquishStun(Hum) -- Quick check to see if they're not stunned local Children = Services.ServerScriptService:GetChildren() for i=1, #Children do if Children[i]:IsA("Script") and Children[i].Name == "VanquishStun" and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target") and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target").Value == Hum.Parent then return true end end return false end
local function FoundTarget(Character)
for i=1,#TargetNames do --check to see if the target is potentially a bat or a vampire if not Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) and find(lower(Character.Name), lower(TargetNames[i])) then return true end local Descendants = Character:GetDescendants() for v = 1, #Descendants do if (Descendants[v]:IsA("BasePart") or Descendants[v]:IsA("Model") or Descendants[v]:IsA("Tool")) and find(lower(Descendants[v].Name), lower(TargetNames[i])) then --Target sighted! return true end end end return false end
local function StunArea(Range) if not WavePart then return end local Position = WavePart.Position local Neg, Pos = Position - Vector.new(1,1,1) * (Range*.5), Position + Vector.new(1,1,1) * (Range*.5) local Reg = Region.new(Neg,Pos) local Parts = workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Reg,{(Creator and Creator.Value and Creator.Value.Character) or nil,unpac(IgnoreList)},huge)
for i=1,#Parts,1 do if Parts[i] and Parts[i].Parent and (Parts[i].Position-Position).Magnitude <= Range then IgnoreList[#IgnoreList+1] = Parts[i] -- Ignore it so lag is mitigated
local Hum,FF = Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),Parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if Hum and Hum.Health ~= 0 and not FF and not IsInTable(IgnoreHumanoids,Hum) and not IsTeamMate(Creator.Value, Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then IgnoreHumanoids[#IgnoreHumanoids+1] = Hum if FoundTarget(Hum.Parent) then
warn("Target Sighted!")
UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Creator.Value) Hum.Parent:BreakJoints() --Make sure it KOs
local EffectBox = Create("Part"){ Locked = true, Anchored = true, CanCollide = false, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Size = Vector3.new(0,0,0), CFrame = Parts[i].CFrame, Transparency = 1, Parent = workspace }
local PoofSmoke = script:WaitForChild("PoofSmoke"):Clone() PoofSmoke.Parent = EffectBox PoofSmoke:Emit(100)
local PoofSound = script:WaitForChild("PoofSound"):Clone() PoofSound.Parent = EffectBox PoofSound:Play()
Services.Debris:AddItem(EffectBox,max(PoofSmoke.Lifetime.Max,PoofSound.TimeLength)+.5)
for _,parts in pairs(Hum.Parent:GetDescendants()) do if parts:IsA("BasePart") then parts:Destroy() end end
else if not VanquishStun(Hum) then --local HeadShake = Hum:LoadAnimation(script:WaitForChild("Animations"):WaitForChild(Hum.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("HeadShake")) --HeadShake:Play(nil,nil,Seed:NextNumber(1,3)) local VanquishScript = script:WaitForChild("VanquishStun"):Clone() Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = Hum.Parent, Parent = VanquishScript } VanquishScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService VanquishScript.Disabled = false end end --print("Affecting "..Hum.Parent.Name) end end end end
for i=1, ceil(60*(3)),1 do if WaveMesh and WavePart then WaveMesh.Scale = Vector.new(1,1,1)* (300 * (i/ceil(60*(3)))) WavePart.Transparency = (i/ceil(60*(3))) coroutine.wrap(function() StunArea((300 * (i/ceil(60*(3))))) end)() end
Services.RunService.Stepped:Wait() end
if WavePart then WavePart:Destroy() end
for i=1,#Anims do if Anims[i] then Anims[i]:Stop() end end
script:Destroy()

local Target = script:WaitForChild("Target")
if not Target or not Target.Value then script:Destroy() end
Target = Target.Value
local Head = Target:WaitForChild("Head")
local Humanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Humanoid:UnequipTools()
local Stop = false coroutine.wrap(function() repeat Humanoid.JumpPower = 0 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:Wait() until Stop end)()
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), }
local HeadshakeAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(script:WaitForChild("HeadShake"..Humanoid.RigType.Name)) HeadshakeAnim:Play(.5)
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Disable = script:WaitForChild("DisableBackpack") Disable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Disable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Disable,1) Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target).CharacterRemoving:Connect(function(Char)--keeps people from a hidden inventory local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end) end
wait(3) Stop = false if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end HeadshakeAnim:Stop() Humanoid.JumpPower = 50 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
script:Destroy()

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Scripted by TakeoHonorable --Kick your victim into a coffin >:3
local Target,Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Target"), script:FindFirstChild("Creator")
if not Target or not Target.Value or not Creator or not Creator.Value then script:Destroy() end
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player --Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local function weldBetween(a, b) --Make a new Weld and Parent it to a. local weld = Instance.new("ManualWeld", a) --Get the CFrame of b relative to a. weld.C0 = a.CFrame:inverse() * b.CFrame --Set the Part0 and Part1 properties respectively weld.Part0 = a weld.Part1 = b --Return the reference to the weld so that you can change it later. return weld end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")), InsertService = (game:FindService("InsertService") or game:GetService("InsertService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")) } Target, Creator,CreatorCharacter = Target.Value, Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator.Value),Creator.Value local TargetHumanoid,CreatorHumanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") TargetHumanoid.BreakJointsOnDeath = false UntagHumanoid(TargetHumanoid) TagHumanoid(TargetHumanoid,Creator) -- So they won't call in for cheap shots C:
local CoffinModel = Services.InsertService:LoadAsset(179174097) if CoffinModel and CoffinModel:FindFirstChild("Part",true) then -- Removes the hidden watermark CoffinModel:FindFirstChild("Part",true):Destroy() end
if not CoffinModel then script:Destroy() end
local Invincibility = Create("ForceField"){ Visible = false, Parent = CreatorHumanoid.Parent } Services.Debris:AddItem(Invincibility,7)--Safety Catch
local Coffin = CoffinModel:WaitForChild("Coffin")
local PoofSmoke = script:WaitForChild("PoofSmoke")
local SummonSound = script:FindFirstChild("Summon")
Coffin.PrimaryPart = Coffin:WaitForChild("CoffinBottom") PoofSmoke.Parent = Coffin.PrimaryPart --Coffin:SetPrimaryPartCFrame((Target:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Target:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Target:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")).CFrame) local CreatorTorso = (CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or CreatorCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) CreatorTorso.Anchored = true local TargetTorso = (Target:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Target:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) local Size = Target:GetExtentsSize() local X,Y,Z = Size.X,Size.Y,Size.Z local Scale = math.max(X,Y,Z) / 5
Coffin.PrimaryPart.Size = Coffin.PrimaryPart.Size * Scale Coffin:WaitForChild("CoffinCover"):WaitForChild("CoffinTop").Size = Coffin:WaitForChild("CoffinCover"):WaitForChild("CoffinTop").Size * Scale
Coffin:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(CreatorTorso.CFrame*CFrame.new(0,TargetTorso.Size.Y*.7,-20*Scale))
Coffin:WaitForChild("CoffinCover"):WaitForChild("CoffinTop").CFrame = Coffin.PrimaryPart.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90),0,math.rad(-90))*CFrame.new(-4*Scale,3*Scale,0)
local FinishScript = script:WaitForChild("Finish") Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = TargetHumanoid.Parent, Parent = FinishScript } FinishScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService FinishScript.Disabled = false
Coffin.Parent = workspace
if SummonSound then SummonSound.Parent = Coffin.PrimaryPart SummonSound:Play() end
PoofSmoke:Emit(100*Scale)
CoffinModel:Destroy() -- We don't need this anymore
TargetTorso.Anchored = true TargetTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new((CreatorTorso.CFrame*CFrame.new(0,0,-3*Scale)).p, CreatorTorso.CFrame.p)
CreatorTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(CreatorTorso.Position, TargetTorso.Position)
coroutine.wrap(function() CreatorTorso.Anchored = false CreatorTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(CreatorTorso.Position, TargetTorso.Position) CreatorTorso.Anchored = true Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end)()
wait(2)
local KickAnim = CreatorHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script:FindFirstChild("Kick"..CreatorHumanoid.RigType.Name))
KickAnim:Play(nil,nil,8)
--wait(1)
local KickSound,Scream,Slam = script:FindFirstChild("KickSound"),script:FindFirstChild("Scream"),script:FindFirstChild("Slam") if KickSound then KickSound.Parent = Coffin.PrimaryPart KickSound:Play() end
if Scream then Scream.Parent = Coffin.PrimaryPart Scream:Play() end
TargetTorso.Anchored = false if TargetTorso:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then TargetTorso:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end
local Velo local function Attach(hit) if --[[not hit or not hit.Parent or]] not hit:IsDescendantOf(Target) then return end if TargetTorso then TargetTorso.CFrame = Coffin.PrimaryPart.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(0,math.rad(180),0) TargetTorso.Anchored = false weldBetween(TargetTorso,Coffin.PrimaryPart) if Velo then Velo:Destroy() end end wait(.5) Coffin:WaitForChild("CoffinCover"):WaitForChild("CoffinTop").CFrame = Coffin.PrimaryPart.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90),0,0)*CFrame.new(0,1.3,0) weldBetween(Coffin.PrimaryPart,Coffin:WaitForChild("CoffinCover"):WaitForChild("CoffinTop"))
if Slam and Slam.Parent ~= Coffin.PrimaryPart then Slam.Parent = Coffin.PrimaryPart Slam:Play() end
for _,part in pairs(Coffin:GetDescendants()) do if part and part:IsA("BasePart") then part.Anchored = false if part:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then part:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end end end Coffin.PrimaryPart.RotVelocity = Coffin.PrimaryPart.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(math.random(-15,-10),0,0)) --Tip the coffin over end Coffin.PrimaryPart.Touched:Connect(function(hit) Attach(hit) end)
Velo = Create("BodyVelocity"){ MaxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*math.huge, Velocity = (Coffin.PrimaryPart.Position-TargetTorso.Position).Unit*math.sqrt((Coffin.PrimaryPart.Position-TargetTorso.Position).Magnitude)*10, Parent = TargetTorso } --TargetTorso.Velocity = (Coffin.PrimaryPart.Position-TargetTorso.Position)*math.sqrt((Coffin.PrimaryPart.Position-TargetTorso.Position).Magnitude)
if TargetHumanoid then UntagHumanoid(TargetHumanoid) TagHumanoid(TargetHumanoid,Creator) -- So they won't call in for cheap shots C: TargetHumanoid.Health = 0 --FINISH THEM!! end
wait((KickAnim and KickAnim.Length/8) or 2)
CreatorTorso.Anchored = false
delay(3,function() Attach(TargetTorso)--Do it anyway if Invincibility then Invincibility:Destroy() end wait(10) if TargetTorso and TargetTorso.Parent then -- Make sure they're cleaned up for _,v in pairs(TargetTorso:GetDescendants()) do if v and v:IsA("BasePart") then v:Destroy() end end end if Coffin then for i=0,60,1 do for _,v in pairs(Coffin:GetDescendants()) do if v and v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Transparency = i/60 end end Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end if Coffin then Coffin:Destroy() end end script:Destroy() end)

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Target = script:WaitForChild("Target")
if not Target or not Target.Value then script:Destroy() end
Target = Target.Value
local Head = Target:WaitForChild("Head")
local Humanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Humanoid:UnequipTools()
local Stop = false coroutine.wrap(function() repeat Humanoid.JumpPower = 0 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:Wait() until Stop end)()
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), }
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Disable = script:WaitForChild("DisableBackpack") Disable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Disable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Disable,10) Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target).CharacterRemoving:Connect(function(Char)--keeps people from a hidden inventory if Disable then Disable:Destroy() end local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end) end
wait(10) Stop = false if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Enable = script:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end
Humanoid.JumpPower = 50 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
script:Destroy()

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
local PlayerCamera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local rService = game:GetService("RunService")
for _,accessory in pairs(game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:GetDescendants()) do if accessory and accessory:IsA("BasePart") then accessory.Transparency = 1 end end
repeat StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false) if game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character and game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") and game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then PlayerCamera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Scriptable PlayerCamera.CameraSubject = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") PlayerCamera.CFrame = CFrame.new(game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("Head").CFrame.p)*(game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart").CFrame-game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart").CFrame.p) end rService.RenderStepped:Wait() until not script or not StarterGui

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
local PlayerCamera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local rService = game:GetService("RunService")
repeat PlayerCamera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom PlayerCamera.FieldOfView = 70 PlayerCamera.CameraSubject = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true) rService.RenderStepped:Wait() until not script or not StarterGui

local Tool = script.Parent
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote",10)
--local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MouseInput")
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
function Secondary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.Q) end end
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
Services.Input:BindAction("Secondary",Secondary,true,Enum.KeyCode.Q,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonY) Services.Input:SetTitle("Secondary","Vampire Vanquish") Services.Input:SetPosition("Secondary",UDim2.new(.5,0,0,0)) end
function Unequipped() --Services.Input:UnbindAction("PeriPrimary") Services.Input:UnbindAction("Secondary") end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
--[[function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end]]

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)
